entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • All Quick Actions should have assignable shortcuts #75693
  • Contextual Intellisense / Autocomplete Settings Grid #75692
  • Suggested changes to VS2022 shortcuts (highly recommended) #75691
  • C# analysis background code analysis #75690
  • Show autocompletion for implementing the methods of an interface that have default implementations #75689
  • Custom Grouping of methods and properties in IntelliSense #75688
  • Generate Type should also be able to generate a record #75687
  • Comment option in the settings in VS VB #75686
  • Searching for References should have a simply UI button that excludes references from unit test projects #75685
  • ```IsWellKnownTypeUnmanagedType``` helper in `C#` compiler fails to filter out generic types. #75681
  • Error when CompilerGeneratedFilesOutputPath is a relative path #75680
  • C# Source Generator - The JSON-RPC connection with the remote party was lost before the request could complete. #75679
  • No nullable warning when combining static generic fields and nullable generic type instantiations #75677
  • Change Signature broken when using Primary Constructors #75676

Closed

  • [MemberNotNull] isn't respected on local functions #56256
    Backlog
  • [Bug]: No IntelliSense pop-ups within interpolation expressions #70918
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35430.275 #75678
  • Nullability mismatch in non-`ref` foreach cannot be suppressed #75430
    17.13

PullRequests

Created

  • Bind lambda in object initializer despite errors #75695
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • MEF Export IServiceBroker #75694
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Include project diagnostic suppressors in host analyzer execution #75684
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Respect [MemberNotNull] on local functions #75448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Proffer project system query service #75682
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Allow suppressing foreach iteration variable nullability mismatch #75432
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #75672
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode
  • Reduce memory and CPU costs due to SegmentedList usage #75661
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75589
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75591
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • VB: Recognize and check an `unmanaged` constraint #75665
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, 17.13
